long_description: With a water- and stain-resistant finish to keep them looking sharp in the outdoors, the Mammut Crags 3/4 pants offer a great fit for hiking or travel. Rugged nylon resists wear and tear, protects from UV light with a UPF 50+ rating, sheds light moisture and stains, dries quickly and won't tug when you're hiking. Drawcord hem; seat pockets with zip; 2 side pockets; regular fit. Overstock.
short_description: With a water- and stain-resistant finish to keep them looking sharp in the outdoors, the Mammut Crags 3/4 pants offer a great fit for hiking or travel.
